title: NBA journalist Taylor Rooks announces her wedding on Instagram | NBA News - Times of India
text:
Image via Taylor Rooks/Instagram NBA journalist Taylor Rooks got married recently. The broadcaster announced her marriage on Instagram. Several high-profile guests attended the wedding. Some of them were Saquon Barkley, Jack Harlow, Draymond Green and Donovan Mitchell. She mentioned and gave due credit to everyone involved in the wedding. However, she did not tag her husband. Rooksâ€™ husbandâ€™s identity somehow still stays a mystery. Taylor Rooks posts pictures from her wedding on Instagram On July 23, Taylor Rooks posted a series of pictures on her Instagram. The images were of celebrations from her wedding. While posting these pictures, Taylor wrote, â€œWhat a night. This is love. ğŸ’�â€� Check out the picture in the post below. The wedding seemed very intimate. Looks like Taylor tied the knot in the presence of a small, close circle of friends and family members. Hence, the wedding announcement was a surprise for the fans. The identity of her husband, however, has not been revealed yet. Apart from the menu card, the husbandâ€™s name was not seen or tagged anywhere else. The only clue to his identity is that his name is Shane. Athletes from both the NFL and the NBA attended the wedding. The high-profile guest list also included people from the world of entertainment. Rapper Jack Harlow and singers Lala and Coco Jones were also seen in the pictures. Fans and well-wishers pour in their blessings Even though the announcement came as a surprise, fans and well-wishers extended their warm wishes to the newlyweds. FAQs What is the name of Taylor Rooksâ€™ husband? The name of Taylor Rooksâ€™ husband is Shane Who was Taylor Rooksâ€™ previous partner? Taylor Rooks has been previously associated with actor Jesse Williams, NBA player Kendall Marshall and NFL star Odell Beckham Jr. While nothing has been confirmed, she was also rumored to have had an affair with Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey.
